title: Kat unable to cast some spells once level 10?
body:
So today I hit level 10 with Kat when killing the lane I was against, and afterwards I couldn't cast q, r or even B.

Tried rebinding, tried another keyboard, tried rebooting and NOTHING WORKED!

By the time I worked out that you have to get yourself killed to enable your abilities again, it was already GG as the jungle went afk and the LoL client asked me to agree to not leave games again.....

Having never left a game EVER this is an absolute joke of a bug.

I know it has been encountered by others but please Riot fix this its a complete waste of time to play a champ you can't use the abilities of.

replies.body:
inb4 this is an intentional kat nerf

Seriously though, this *is* a known bug. If you can capture video of it or something, it would be a good idea to send in a [bug report](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report).
